- **Momentum (STABLE)**: Standard time frame (4h–1day → 6h).

**Key Factors**: High buy ratio (68% in all flow segments), recent 5 trades (4 buys), and 300-trade dominance (194 buys) confirm strong institutional/bot buying. TP at +15% balances liquidity and risk, while SL at -10% safeguards against sudden dips.
